alert.note: Alert for City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Norfolk; City of Poquoson; City of Portsmouth; City of Suffolk; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 1:52PM EDT until May 16 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN YORK ...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CENTRAL CITY OF NORFOLK...THE NORTHWESTERN CITY OF PORTSMOUTH...THE NORTHEASTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK...THE CITY OF HAMPTON AND THE SOUTHERN CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 152 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hampton University, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Old Dominion University around 155 PM EDT. Hampton University, Langley AFB, Fort Monroe and Norfolk NAS around 200 PM EDT. Ocean View, Buckroe Beach and Grand View around 205 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hobson, Fox Hill, Phoebus, Langley View, Wards Corner, Huntersville, Deanes, Messick, Hilton Village and Willoughby Spit. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Norfolk; City of Poquoson; City of Portsmouth; City of Suffolk; York
